name: Christmas Land
description:
-- Story -- 

Santa Claus went insane and then the people killed him but krampus actually liked the insane Santa Claus so he's going to wake him back to life so he put his arm down through the Chimneys and promises kids that they can go to Christmas land.

-- Gameplay --

Press buildings with the mouse to steal kids then go to Christmas land by pressing "E" and grind them up for energy. 

 Based on the story "Christmas Land" by Elias Witherow.

This game was made in 48 hours for the AAU Game Jam 2022 by two people.
